channel.title: Mindwarp - How does it work on different abilities?
channel.description: How does mindwarp affect all abilities? I was debd by a Drunk while trying to mindwarp a Sheriff, and the Drunk never complained so I assume my mindwarp didn't do anything? I would like a table showing how Mindwarp affects all abilities so I know how to use it.

item.title: Mindwarp - How does it work on different abilities?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Well he would definitely see that he was attacked.

Read full topic
